channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report X-2023120375
item.description:
Report X-2023120375

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-18T21:10:37+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-03
  • City: BILLINGS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet on the unload side. Inspection found one bottle of Power Liquid had lost its cap allowing contents to leak out. DescribePack: na DurationRel: 8 and MitigateEffect: na

item.title: Report X-2023120346
item.description:
Report X-2023120346

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-18T21:10:37+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-03
  • City: GREAT FALLS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found by OB crew when Coordinator came in for shift. Package was left in a plastic tote and was leaking. Coordinator moved box to separate area and began hazmat process. DescribePack: cap on one of the bottles failed and leaked. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: moved hazmat to separate area for processing.
